author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed cleanup to lighting filters (more may be coming)
2) Preliminary xml:base support.
3) Reworked implementation of external use that leverages xml:base support.
4) Some more fixes in ParsedURL stuff to go along with #2 & #3

author: hillion
msg: Added support for CSS @media rules in the browser (the canvas is a "screen"
medium, the print button is a "print" medium) and the transcoders (they now
have a KEY_MEDIA optional hint).

author: cjolif
msg: take modification into scripting (new evaluate method) into account

author: cjolif
msg: Add to the Interpreter interface an evaluate method that take a String in
addition to the one that uses a Reader.
Implement it, in the different Interpreter concrete classes.
This new method allows in the RhinoIntepreter to easily do some cache
on the compilation of small pieces of ECMAScript code. This avoid
the re-compilation (and thus creation of dynamic Java Classes) at
each time an evaluation is performed.
The idea and a first draft solution was proposed by George Moudry.
